panels.title: 北极星调用次数（全部线程）

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="cpu"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="file"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="net"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="epoll"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="futex"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="other"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid=~"$tid", type="runq"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))
